front.title: A YANG Data Model for a Truststore

abstract.t: This document defines a YANG 1.1 data model for configuring globally- accessible bags of certificates and public keys that can be referenced by other data models for trust. Editorial Note (To be removed by RFC Editor) This draft contains placeholder values that need to be replaced with finalized values at the time of publication. This note summarizes all of the substitutions that are needed. No other RFC Editor instructions are specified elsewhere in this document. Artwork in this document contains shorthand references to drafts in progress.
